1370: Baua moved to Kerckstraet.C.2 after marriage.
Got married to Bernero at age 21 in 1370.
1372: Lost son Grote when Grote was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Grote in 1372 at age 23.
1376: Gave birth to Lisebette in 1376 at age 27.
1378: Gave birth to Esa in 1378 at age 29.
Lost daughter Esa when Esa was 1 years old.
1379: Gave birth to Arnoud in 1379 at age 30.
1380: Lost son Arnoud when Arnoud was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1381: Gave birth to Heylewigis in 1381 at age 32.
1388: Lost daughter Heylewigis when Heylewigis was 8 years old.
